You can scroll through the images using: You can scroll through the images using the mouse wheel or scrollbar.
You can zoom the images using the right: You can zoom the images using the right click.
You can pan the images using the middle: You can pan the images using the middle click.
You can modify the window level using th: You can modify the window level using the left click.
You can measure the length of a region u: You can measure the length of a region using the Length tool.
Use the length tool on the viewport to m: Use the length tool on the viewport to measure the length of a region.
Click yes to track the measurements in t: Click yes to track the measurements in the measurement panel.
Click the measurements button to open th: Click the measurements button to open the measurements panel.
Scroll the images using the mouse wheel: Scroll the images using the mouse wheel away from the measurement.
Jumping to Measurements in the Panel: Jumping to Measurements in the Panel
Click the measurement in the measurement: Click the measurement in the measurement panel to jump to it.
You can change the layout of the viewer: You can change the layout of the viewer using the layout button.
Select the MPR layout to view the images: Select the MPR layout to view the images in MPR mode.
